name: py-jsonschema

dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-vcversioner
dependencies.description: Vcversioner: Take version numbers from version control.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-pyrsistent
dependencies.description:
Pyrsistent is a number of persistent collections (by some referred to as
functional data structures). Persistent in the sense that they are
immutable.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-functools32
dependencies.description:
Backport of the functools module from Python 3.2.3 for use on 2.7 and
PyPy.

dependent_to.name: pacifica-cli
dependent_to.description: Python CLI for Pacifica Core Services

dependent_to.description: Node Resource Manager

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-telemetry

Jupyter Telemetry enables Jupyter Applications to record events and
transmit

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the ML
ecosystem.

dependent_to.name: tskit

The tskit library provides the underlying functionality used to load,
examine, and manipulate tree sequences

dependent_to.name: flux-sched

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description: Snakemake is an MIT-licensed workflow management system.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-basis-set-exchange
dependent_to.description: Command-line interface for the Basis Set Exchange Website

dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependent_to.name: py-warlock
dependent_to.description: Self-validating Python objects using JSON schema

dependent_to.name: reframe
dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.

dependent_to.name: callflow
dependent_to.description:
CallFlow is an interactive visual analysis tool that provides a high-
level overview of CCTs together with semantic refinement operations to
progressively explore the CCTs.

dependent_to.name: py-sphobjinv
dependent_to.description: Sphinx objects.inv Inspection/Manipulation Tool.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server
dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications

dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-terra
dependent_to.description:
Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the
level of extended quantum circuits, operators, and algorithms.

dependent_to.name: py-asdf
dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.
